DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether use airway stent ( metal tube open keep open narrow airway ) together standard treatment increase proportion patient complete 6min walk distance ( 6MWD ) test 2 week +/- 2days patient breathlessness due lung cancer , compare standard treatment alone .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Stents Open Restricted Airways Patients With Centrally Placed Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Able give inform write consent English language Able willing attend St Georges Hospital / Royal Marsden Hospital stent insertion ( allocate ) documentation 6 minute walk distance . Willing reattend followup 6 minute walk distance St Georges Hospital / Royal Marsden Hospital 2 week later ( patient ) Diagnosis nonsmall cell lung cancer centrally place tumour degree airway obstruction information bronchoscopy CT scan . ECOG Performance status : 03 Relative contraindication stenting , e.g . bleed abnormality anticoagulation problem . Pregnancy Radically treatable disease .
